A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi has its highs and lows but mostly highs. The Casino scene seems a little unnecessary and adds length to an already long movie. Some of the lore is discarded and some characters receive a rather unsatisfying ending. Adam Driver does an excellent job as a conflicted Kylo Ren. i enjoyed the dichotomy between him and Rey. I am unsure which direction the third film will go in as this film left me not invested in the characters. This wasnt the theatrical miracle that I longed for but all in all it was a flawed but enjoyable film.
